snippet: An explosion devastated a section of a major refinery in Torrance on Wednesday, raining down ash in the area and, experts say, probably helping to increase California gas prices.
abstract: Accidental explosion destroys section of a major refinery in Torrance, Calif owned by Exxon Mobil; experts say damage to refinery will probably contribute to higher gas prices in state.
lead_paragraph: An explosion devastated a section of a major refinery in Torrance on Wednesday, raining down ash in the area and, experts say, probably helping to increase California gas prices.
